text: Badwi (bedouins) arabon mein se bhi bahut se log aaye jinhon ne uzar (excuse) kiye taa-ke unhein bhi pichey reh janey ki ijazat di jaye is tarah baith rahey woh log jinhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool se iman ka jhoota ahad kiya tha. In badwiyon (bedouins) mein se jin logon ne kufr ka tareeqa ikhtiyar kiya hai anqareeb woh dardnaak saza se do-chaar hongey
